branchCategory.name: PB
branchCategory.description: <p>The PB series is a compact, single acting diaphragm pump which is suitable for transfer and recovery of a wide variety of fluids. The PB series is available with a built-in solenoid valve or in an air operated style. Space is saved due to the centralization of piping and wiring areas on the top and bottom surfaces.</p>

branchItem.name: PB1000A, Process Pump, Body Wetted Parts: Polypropylene/Stainless Steel
